gameReview: A fun shooter with wacky aesthetics
I had so much fun it was very nostalgic
I had fun playing with friends
Really hooks you in I found myself playing this for hours
The proximity chat made the game so fun and scary
The story is great and very funny as well
One of the best shooting games to date
Very visually pleasing graphics and so fun to play
Had a rough start but the game as really redeemed itself
A really good successor to the first 2 games
One of the best games I've ever played
